title: Radial Stacked Bar Chart
sourceText: Estimated Population by Age and State, US Census

properties.description: The width of the inner radius inversed, in pixels.
The radius of the inner circle, in pixels.
The fill colors for each bar stack.  The colorRange array length  MUST match number of datasets.
The scale factor from the center.
The boolean value for if the dataset is sorted.
The font size of all text on the chart, in pixels.
The color of the inner radius ticks.
The color of the scale rings.
The color of the scale text.
The color of the scale text background/stroke.
The width of the color legend key, in pixels.
